About me

My adventure with programming began in August 2021. I learn new things quickly and try to do everything accurately. I improve my skills every day and have a lot of fun doing it. I am very motivated to continue learning and gaining experience.

In my free time from coding I like to cook, play video games and spend time with friends. I am a calm, patient person who strives to achieve my goals.

If you wanna know more about me, check my Github profile or write me.
